bibl.title: Studies in the Early Text of the Gospels and Acts. The Papers of the First Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament [11-17 April 1997]
bibl.note: PICKERING S.R., The Significance of Non-Continuous New Testament Textual Materials in Papyri.

D.G.K. TAYLOR (Ed.), Studies in the Early Text of the Gospels and Acts. The Papers of the First Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament [11-17 April 1997] = Texts and Studies. Third Series. 1 (Edgbaston, Birmingham, 1999) pp. 121-141.
